players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found her to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she might try to mislead. I think Alice is mafia."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Charlie, you say you investigated Alice and found her mafia. If you are detective, why accuse her? I think we should vote on you."
Charlie: "Bob was killed by mafia. I investigated Alice, found her mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she will try to mislead. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, if you’re detective you wouldn’t accuse Alice. If you’re mafia you’d lie. I think you’re mafia. Vote for Charlie."
You: "Charlie, you say you found me mafia, but you also said Bob was killed by mafia. That means you’re lying. I think you’re the real mafia."

You: "Bob was killed by mafia. I investigated Alice, found her mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she will try to mislead. Vote Alice."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
